# io.features_to_ome_zarr { #operetta_compose.io.features_to_ome_zarr }

`io.features_to_ome_zarr(zarr_url, feature_table, feature_name='regionprops')`

Save features to the OME-ZARR fileset

## Parameters

| Name            | Type               | Description                                                      | Default         |
|-----------------|--------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------|
| `feature_table` | pd.DataFrame       | Dataframe with feature measurements generated by `feature_table` | _required_      |
| `zarr_url`      | Union\[str, Path\] | Path to the OME-ZARR                                             | _required_      |
| `feature_name`  | str                | Folder name of the measured regionprobs feature table            | `'regionprops'` |
| `overwrite`     |                    | Whether to overwrite any existing features                       | _required_      |
